fields.description: A jurisdictional record can be classified as "State", "Financial" (district), "Supraregional", "Regional" or "Federal" according to the legal nature of its rules.
Comprehensive regional classification according to the purposes of this research project. Asia & Pacific and South & Latin America are consolidated regions.

The Global North does not refer to a geographic region in any traditional sense but rather to the relative power and wealth of countries in distinct parts of the world. The Global North includes many countries in the Northern Hemisphere and also some, such as Australia and New Zealand, that are located in the Southern Hemisphere. The Global South includes many countries in the southern hemisphere and some in the northern hemisphere. (see L. Braff and K. Nelson, The Global North: Introducing the region, in Gendered Lives, State University of New York, 2022).
